13 #ifndef QUADGRID_LEGENDRE_HPP
14 #define QUADGRID_LEGENDRE_HPP
15 
16 /// \file
17 /// \brief Functions for computing Legendre polynomials.
18 #include <vector>
19 #include <cstddef>
20 
21 namespace quadgrid
22 {
23 
24 /// \brief Computes Legendre polynomials \( P_0(x), P_1(x), \dots, P_N(x) \).
25 /// \param P Output vector that will contain \( N+1 \) values: P[0] through P[N].
26 /// \param x Input value at which to evaluate the polynomials.
27 /// \param N Maximum order of the Legendre polynomial.
28 /// \note The output vector P is resized if necessary.
29 void legendrePoly(std::vector<double>& P, const double x, const size_t N);
30 
31 /// \brief Computes Legendre polynomials and their first derivatives at point \( x \).
32 /// \param P Output vector for Legendre polynomials \( P_0(x), \dots, P_N(x) \) (size N+1).
33 /// \param dPdx Output vector for first derivatives \( \frac{d}{dx}P_0(x), \dots, \frac{d}{dx}P_N(x) \).
34 /// \param x Input value at which to evaluate the polynomials and derivatives.
35 /// \param N Maximum order of the Legendre polynomial.
36 /// \note Both output vectors P and dPdx are resized if necessary.
37 void legendrePoly(std::vector<double>& P,
38  std::vector<double>& dPdx,
39  const double x,
40  const size_t N);
41 
42 
43 
44 }//end namespace quadgrid
